title: Lu-Ma Cafe
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Macrobiotic, Organic, Western, Juice bar, Take-out, British, English, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Cafe in Wimbledon's Town Centre. Menu is sugar-free and vegan except for fish and chicken. Has gluten free food and desserts. Drinks include fresh juices, herbal teas, coffee and coffee alternatives. Uses organic and seasonal produce where possible. Free Wi-Fi.
